description: Try our easy to follow Lemon Tempura Flathead recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lemon Tempura Flathead Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Dip the fish pieces in the batter to coat, allowing excess to drain before carefully lowering the fish into hot oil. Cook, in batches of 3-4 pieces, for 5 minutes or until golden. Drain on crumpled paper towel. Serve with fries and lemon wedges.
